description.value:
This 2-foot-diameter black &Reference[sphere]{sphere} is a hole in the multiverse, hovering in space and stabilized by a magical field surrounding it.

The &Reference[sphere]{sphere} obliterates all matter it passes through and all matter that passes through it. Artifacts are the exception. Unless an artifact is susceptible to damage from a &Reference[sphere]{sphere} of annihilation, it passes through the &Reference[sphere]{sphere} unscathed. Anything else that touches the &Reference[sphere]{sphere} but isn't wholly engulfed and obliterated by it takes 4d10 &Reference[force]{force} damage.

The &Reference[sphere]{sphere} is stationary until someone controls it. If you are within 60 feet of an uncontrolled &Reference[sphere]{sphere}, you can use an action to make a DC 25 &Reference[int]{Intelligence} (&Reference[arc]{Arcana}) check. On a success, the &Reference[sphere]{sphere} levitates in one direction of your choice, up to a number of feet equal to 5 × your &Reference[int]{Intelligence} modifier (minimum 5 feet). On a failure, the &Reference[sphere]{sphere} moves 10 feet toward you. A creature whose space the &Reference[sphere]{sphere} enters must succeed on a [[/save dex 13 format=long]] or be touched by it, taking 4d10 &Reference[force]{force} damage.

If you attempt to control a &Reference[sphere]{sphere} that is under another creature's control, you make an &Reference[int]{Intelligence} (&Reference[arc]{Arcana}) check contested by the other creature's &Reference[int]{Intelligence} (&Reference[arc]{Arcana}) check. The winner of the contest gains control of the &Reference[sphere]{sphere} and can levitate it as normal.

If the &Reference[sphere]{sphere} comes into contact with a planar portal, such as that created by the @UUID[Compendium.world.ddb-lost-mines-phandelver-spells.Item.7rM4o11MOJQxJJIj]{gate} spell, or an extradimensional space, such as that within a portable hole, the GM determines randomly what happens, using the following table.

d100 Result
01-50 The &Reference[sphere]{sphere} is destroyed.
51-85 The &Reference[sphere]{sphere} moves through the portal or into the extradimensional space.
86-00 A spatial rift sends each creature and object within 180 feet of the &Reference[sphere]{sphere}, including the &Reference[sphere]{sphere}, to a random plane of existence.
